articles.author: David K. Li
articles.title: Minnesota high court tosses murder conviction against Mohamed Noor, former Minneapolis police officer - NBC News
articles.description: Mohamed Noor was convicted of third-degree murder for shooting and killing Justine Ruszczyk Damond in 2017. The Minnesota Supreme Court tossed that conviction.
articles.content:
The Minnesota Supreme Court on Wednesday reversed the third-degree murder conviction of former Minneapolis police officer Mohamed Noor, who fatally shot a 911 caller four years ago.
